-- Test script;

create source sensor_readings(
    sensor_id bigint,
    location varchar,
    temperature double,
    primary key (sensor_id)
);

create materialized view wincanton_readings as
    select sensor_id, location, temperature
    from sensor_readings
    where location='wincanton';

--load data sensor_readings_1;

select * from sensor_readings order by location;

select * from wincanton_readings;
